results.name: Least common multiple of reversals of divisors of n in decimal representation.
comment: a(A002385(n)) = A002385(n), see A188650 for all fixed points.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences related to lcm's
program: a188649 n = foldl lcm 1 $ map a004086 $ filter ((== 0) . mod n) [1..n]
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 11 2011
